original_text: The Israelites watched Joshua as he made a copy of God's Law on the stones. This was the Law that Moses had written.
korean_text: 여호수아가 거기서 모세가 기록한 율법을 이스라엘 자손의 목전에서 그 돌에 기록하매

sentences.original_text: as he made a copy of God's Law on the stones
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 돌에 하나님의 법을 복사할 때
